name: Tacos Y Mas
address: 18-31 Mott Ave, Far Rockaway, NY 11691, USA

reviews.text: Tacos y mas has a good customer service, it was also pretty good. The tacos were fresh and had real flavor, especially the birria ones. The place is really calm and the people and workers were nice. Service was good and food was delicious. Iâ€™d go back for sure.
great service and food prices. food was amazing. would definitely recommend and comeback

This place serves amazing food! Birra most of the times in point. Service is always amazing.

We order for delivery so canâ€™t give a review about the restaurant experience but food is of quality
Muy  buena comida y buen servicio.
La peor comida , porfavor no ordenen ahÃ­ es lo mÃ¡s malo que puede a verâ€¦

I love every bit of my experience. The fact that they make all orders fresh was very refreshing. They had this strawberry lemonade with chia seed that was soooo delicious. Although I took my order to go there was a family enjoying a meal and the manger came to check on them as well.
Very good food.

Delivery from here is excellent! I can't say enough about how delicious the food is how the portions are generous everything arrives hot with all utensils. It's an excellent restaurant and I appreciate them. Chimichangas are delicious and the grilled chicken is fabulous.!!! and don't forget the desserts they have plenty and they're all good and fresh

Muy buenos tacos ğŸŒ® son de los mejores
Went for the first time last week and Iâ€™ve been back 3 times. There food is amazing and they deserve 5 stars!!!!
Ordered Flautas and the Chicken was under cooked. They refused to give me a refund. I'm calling the Heath Department First thing Monday morning.

Wow! Just WOW! how is the food this good AND the staff this friendly? Add in uplifting Christian music and Iâ€™m basically having church with my breakfast. This place isnâ€™t just serving mealsâ€”itâ€™s serving joy on a plate.

Wow Iâ€™m so highly disappointed in the customer service I wasnâ€™t pleased with my taco and I wanted to change them or get a refund the cashier wasnâ€™t understanding but was very respectful to his kind not good for business but god bless I only took 2 bites to see if it was just the first bite still not pleasing to me
Very friendly staff. Great food

Espero no ofender a los que dicen que la comida es buena pero estoy decepcionado pedÃ­ tres ordenes de pollo con tajadas el pollo estaba duro creo que era pollo amanecido las disque tajadas estaban negras quemadas y venÃ­an frÃ­as las tres Ã³rdenes y gaste 50 dÃ³lares muy mal ya perdiÃ³ la fama de ser bueno ese restaurante
Love this place.  They are clean and the food is delicious ğŸ˜‹
Exelente

I ordered grilled chicken with rice and beans which tasted good. However, the long wait and bad customer service spoiled my lunch time meal to go experience.  Had to wait almost 40 minutes for the food after being told that I would only need to wait 15 minutes. As I sat waiting,  I was watching the cooks make my order fresh down to boiling the water for the rice. There was food out that was already cooked and looked as if they let the grease get cold based on the oily appearance. When people ordered, i watched the cooks pick up the items and place them into the microwave to re-heat. When I finally walked over to the cashier for the third time, I received my food with an attitude and no apology for the wait. Meanwhile, I am seeing him be so gracious and courteous to all the Spanish clients. I will never go back.
the food was very disappointing and I paid 14.46$ and it was very bad

First off, Iâ€™m a regular there. I order at least once or twice a month. They know I eat there often and upon messing up my food today, I requested some type of compensation for their wrongdoings. The man on the phone, not only said that I wouldnâ€™t be compensated but if I did in fact want my money back I would have to return the food. My only options were wait an extra 30 minutes on top of the hour I just waited for the food OR give the food back and still wait for my money back. I decided I would return the food and it is now almost 2 hours since I first placed the order and no one has come to refund me. I love the food which is why I was a regular but the disrespect to a loyal customer was ridiculous. Will not be ordering from here anymore.

Itâ€™s truly upsetting that I have to write this review, as I have eaten at this establishment many times in the past. Maybe I wasnâ€™t conscious enough during those times. But today, I went inside to place an order. Moments later, two Hispanic women entered the restaurant and the cashierâ€™s attention immediately went to them, as I stood there at the register waiting for him to place my order. He comes back to the register and begins taking their order, as I stand directly in front of him waiting to place mine. When the women finished placing their order, I confronted him about it, and he did take accountability. Ultimately, I left without placing an order because I refuse to patronize a business that does not value every customer, regardless of their ethnicity.
Todo muy fresco y lugar muy agradable
Lo peor de lo pero aora la comida fria precios altos y aunque pagues cash te cobran taxes y delibery creo q es de lo peor que pueda aber en far Rockaway

Waited a long time for service come to find out they only had salmon. The salmon was nasty and dry , and there no seasoning like they took it out of the freezer and put it on the grill. It tasted like old frost bite. Salad and beans were fine. I made a complaint and I was told that's how they cook their fish. I would not recommend eating their seafood

Really great food. If you want your food delivered fast use DoorDash or Uber eats, they tend to take an hour or more if they deliver it to you directly. I recommend the tacos birria! Always good and yummy. I would also recommend their burgers !!! Unfortunately they do make mistakes when you get food delivered, Iâ€™ve ordered empanadas twice and they send me steak instead of cheese very very unfortunate
Quaint restaurant with great food!
Very nice

Will never be coming back , the male workers only cater to their people. I watched the man give 3 plates to people that was waiting all different tables but when my order was ready I had to get up and walk over to receive my food. Then there is a fly/ bug in the salad 0/10 will never be coming back
Decepcionado, el sabor estava bueno pero me dieron mas hueso que carne. Parte de la carne dura y no cosida. Y pague casi $30 por esto ğŸ‘

The chicken was chewy. The steak is disgusting - gooey but also dry at the same time. Thereâ€™s no cheese at all. Avocado brown. No dressing either. Barely any guacamole, sour cream, or pico. To top it off, it took 2 hours to come for deliveryâ€¦ food was ice cold when arrived. Unfortunately, it did not leave our tastebuds on their knees begging for moreâ€¦
amazing food !
Little ripped off but tacos and quesadillas wasnâ€™t that bad
Excellent they cook from there heart

Es un lugar me gusta mucho, he ido varias veces y la comida es buena, con  buen precio y con varias opciones interesantes del menÃº mexicano. Tienen adicional un espacio donde se preparan bebidas, no estaba abierto cuando fui, me imagino que harÃ­an las tradicionales bebidas en base a tequila, suculentas, etc . Una sugerencia de buena fue y es siento que las pantallas muestran mucho texto y puede ser abrumador elegir algo, ojalÃ¡ hicieran un pequeÃ±o ajuste de marketing porque los lugares buenos merecen crecer sus ventas y llegar a mÃ¡s personas.

It is a place I like a lot, I have gone several times and the food is good, at a good price and with several interesting options from the Mexican menu. They have an additional space where drinks are prepared, it was not open when I went, I imagine that they would make the traditional drinks based on tequila, succulents, etc. A good suggestion was and is feel like the screens show a lot of text and it can be overwhelming to choose something, I wish they would do a little marketing adjustment because good places deserve to grow their sales and reach more people.

Gracias y nos vemos en un prÃ³ximo viaje.

Authentic Mexican Hispanic foods. Nice family run independent restaurant vibe. Large selections menu. All entrees are homemade. Some  beverages like horchata made there too. Food is delicious! Generous portions. Service is friendly and attentive. Most of the servers appear (to me) to be younger relatives of the man who owns the place. One or two servers know very little english .
Nice family friendly dining area. They take credit cards, BUT they'll add 4% more to your total.

We were really missing Mexican food like we have at home! This place did not disappoint. The birria tacos were so tasty! My bf got several different tacos and they were all delish! Prices are on point too!

Not sure what this is but it shouldnâ€™t be in my food!! 1st .. and last bite of my steak taco. Disgusting. The quality of the food here has been on a rapid decline. Steak has absolutely no seasoning AT ALL. So bland. The chicken quesadilla is extremely soggy. Even though it has flavor, You will need a fork to eat it. Definitely a waste of money. FYI: This place favors Spanish speaking individuals.

I've eaten in alot of Spanish restaurants and this place is personally my favorite one.  Great atmosphere, great prices, large portions, authentic and delicous foods.  Their meats are always juicy and taste fresh.  I got their taco salad, tostadas, and chimichanga.  Check them out if you're in the area, or you'll be missing out!

Saw a write up in our local paper and decided to try. Taco salad with grilled chicken and 3 chkn taco supremes. Taco salad was full of flavor and was filling. The tacos were a little bland but hot sauce fixed that up. Would go back again to try more stuff.
The food was very fresh, hot upon arrival and flavorful with great presentation.

Donâ€™t get me wrong, although a lot of the time the food is hit or miss, it never fails to be that one place thatâ€™s kind of like a guilty pleasure. When I went in there, the service was pretty good and all the staff were super friendly and even gave me and my friend a piece of candy before we walked out the door (it was really gross and we spit it out but thatâ€™s not the point). Might wanna ask to hold the flies though when it comes to dining in. Theyâ€™re everywhere and you might as well take it to go.

The food is terrible. I ordered guacamole with my food and they did not give me guacamole that I paid extra for. The chicken is disgusting, beef is nasty, and steak is terrible. The food has no flavor

I waited 15 minutes for 2 chicken empanadas and I swear I have never had anything as disgusting as that. When I bit into it it looked like cat food and it just tasted like mystery meat. I spent $10 for no reason. Maybe the tacos are a hit but Iâ€™m not coming back to find out.
Las tortas son riquisimass exelente lugar siempre voy con mis hijosğŸ™â€¦

I like all the food, the atmosphere, my son liked the tacos, he was so delighted that he asked me to come back again. We live in Long Island City and I recommend it because I am going to come back again for more tacos ğŸŒ®ğŸŒ®,me gusto todo la comida el ambiente ami hijo le gustaron los tacos quedo tan encantado que me pidio que regresemos otraves nosotros vivimos en Long Island City y les recomiendo porque yo si voy a regresar otraves por mas tacos ğŸŒ®ğŸŒ®

Amazing food for a great price. They remodeled and made the place look lovely. Delivery can take some time. I don't blame them , it is one of the few good restaurants in Far Rockaway. When I go there the man takes call after call after call for delivery. Also the servers are attentive and food comes quick.

Food was absolutely delicious! I thought at first it was a little expensive until I actually got home and saw how much food they give you! It lasted 2 days. This was my first time going there and will DEFINITELY be going back for sure!
Tacos are very good and papusas are great!

Surprisingly good .... little mom and pop shop in Far Rockaway with such great tasting authentic Mexican food . If I'm ever out that way again it's certainly a go to spot .... the nachos are great and filling,  skirt steak was very tasty and juicy and the chicken enchiladas were on point ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ 2 thumbs up guys keep up the good work !!!
Food was good. Nice casual place

Llevo varios aÃ±os de ser clienta del lugar..
Pero han bajado en calidad  de comida..
Toda la comida tienen el mismo sabor(zason)
Los precios muy altos...ultimadamente no dan recibo y lo exijes y no lo envian con el monto de q consumes y sus precios.. solo envian lo de tu orden.. creo q es devido al poco personal y a la demanda de ordenes.. porque es un restaurante bendecido en el area de farrockaway!! Solo que no deverian bajar ni en calidad ni en comida... los tacos ya no son de asada sino de carne sancichada sin sabor ni cebollani cilantro tortilla calentada en el microondas q ni le matan lo helado... recientemente ordene pollo asado me lo mandaron al carbon quemado... y repito no hay dia en la semana q no ordene comoda aqui.. siempre piden q devuelvas lo q no te gusta sin tocaro morder ... y ponen tantos peros...la carne asada es carne de milanesa  toda reseca...el higado es mas tomate y cebolla sin sabor... lo recomiendo Si... porque no todos los dias son malos .. pero eso de precios justos no son buenos porque es cierto todo esta elevado pero ellos disminuyeron la cantidad y calidad .... y aumentaron el precio..espero que Victor y su esposa lean los comentarios y quejas... porque mensajes no contestan ..ycomo clienta  segun ellos tengo preferencia..

STAY AWAY!!!! THEY ARE NOTHING BUT THIEVES!

I've been ordering deliveries from here for over two years now and haven't had a problem until now.

I called in my order, told them exactly where I lived TWICE and everything was fine. But after waiting over an hour for my order to come, I gave them a call only to have the owner tell me that they don't deliver to where I lived and that they are too busy to deal with me. Are you kidding me?

I wouldn't be so angry if it wasn't for the fact that I had already PAID for the order with my debit card. I can see the transaction and they've charged me for the food already. I asked for a refund and they told me I would have to go into the store even though they are closing in 5 minutes and hung up on me immediately after that.

I've been calling them back but they repeatedly decline my calls and I'm sitting here with NO FOOD & OUT $50.

Iâ€™ve been going here for the birria tacos & it be times idk what to expect. Its no way I should be gettin home & having to cook my meat a little more because my tacos be coming with some uncooked meat! First times it wasnt bad but now? Its like yall dont even be caring to cook it well done like I say. Last time coming back here. Good portions tho.

Their food is delicious and the best Mexican food Iâ€™ve had in a long time. We ordered chicken flautas and guacamole which were seasoned to perfection. Order from this place if you want every bite to feel like a hug from your abuelita <3
